Introducing Researcher with Computer Use in Microsoft 365 Copilot. Start by connecting Researcher to your business data, giving it access to work-related sources like emails, meetings and chatsÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩ without having to manually upload files. Then, enter a prompt aligned to your research goals. Researcher gets startedÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩ intelligently reasoning over the web and your work data, so its responses are tailored to your unique business needs. Using a secure virtual computer, it can access and research the webÔøΩÔøΩÔøΩ clicking, scrolling, and navigating public, gated, and interactive websites while you stay in control and your enterprise data stays protected. When login details or confirmation are needed, Researcher invites you to take control of the interface through a secure screen-sharing connection. After you're done, Researcher continues its work by leveraging tools such as a visual browser to navigate authenticated or interactive websites, a text browser to quickly read and analyze content, and a terminal for advanced code generation. In minutes, you can unlock deeper insights and generate more comprehensive reports securely informed by your work data and the web.
